title: Myskin在BC上报错，提示成功但无效果
author: 向井户爱花
txt_content:
报错具体是这样12:23:03 [信息] Yui executed command: /skin leah
12:23:04 [严重] java.lang.NoSuchFieldException: loginProfile
12:23:04 [严重]     at java.lang.Class.getField(Unknown Source)
12:23:04 [严重]     at eu.blackfire62.myskin.shared.util.Reflect.getField(Reflect.java:38)
12:23:04 [严重]     at eu.blackfire62.myskin.shared.util.Reflect.setObject(Reflect.java:60)
12:23:04 [严重]     at eu.blackfire62.myskin.bungee.skinhandler.SkinHandler_BungeeCord.setSkinProperty(SkinHandler_BungeeCord.java:52)
12:23:04 [严重]     at eu.blackfire62.myskin.bungee.command.SkinCommand$1.run(SkinCommand.java:148)
12:23:04 [严重]     at net.md_5.bungee.scheduler.BungeeTask.run(BungeeTask.java:63)
12:23:04 [严重]     at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
12:23:04 [严重]     at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
12:23:04 [严重]     at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)复制代码

这是插件地址
[角色]MySkin 2.0 —— 离线服务器显示正版皮肤的轻量解决方案[1.8+ 持续更新]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-812782-1-1.html
